Class CannonBallTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • CannonBallTester

  • public class CannonBallTester
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple tester class for testing a CannonBall object. When run, the user is asked for an angle and velocity. A cannonball is then fired with those given parameters, and the progress is printed to System.out.
    Since:
    November 30, 2014

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • askDouble

        private static double askDouble(java.util.Scanner in,
               java.lang.String prompt,
               double low,
               double high)
        Asks the user for a double in the given range. Prompts the user with input, and continues to retry with the same prompt until a valid input is entered that lies within the given range.
        Parameters:
        in - The scanner used to query input.
        prompt - The message to prompt with. Must be formattable with two floats.
        low - The lowest acceptable value.
        high - The highest acceptable value.
        Returns:
        A valid double entered by the user.

      • programExit

        private static void programExit()
        Exits the program, and informs the user. For use when program abruptly needs to exit.
